Trade/Device Name(s): CareSens N LINK Blood Glucose Monitoring System
CareSens N LINK Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CareSens N LINK Blood Glucose Meter
CareSens N LINK Multi Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CareSens N LINK and CareSens N LINK Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems using electrochemical biosensor technology for quantitative glucose measurement in whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips and alternative sites; CareSens N LINK for single-person self-testing at home, CareSens N LINK Multi for multiple-patient professional healthcare settings, both as aids to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control, not for neonates or diabetes diagnosis.
